contactPage.name: Name

contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or suggestion in detail...
contactPage.faq1: How can I get technical support?
contactPage.faqAnswer1: You can get technical support by filling out the contact form, sending an email to support@xtools.com, or calling our customer service hotline. Our technical team will respond to your questions within 24 hours.
contactPage.faqAnswer2: Yes, we provide API interfaces for most of our tools, making it easy for developers to integrate them into their applications. Detailed API documentation can be found in the Developer Center. For commercial authorization, please contact our sales team.
contactPage.faq3: How do I submit feature suggestions or report issues?
contactPage.faqAnswer3: We welcome user feedback and suggestions. You can submit your ideas through the contact form on this page or by sending an email to feedback@xtools.com. Our product team will carefully consider each suggestion and adopt reasonable opinions in product iterations.
